message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on a price closer to $80?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $80. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $105?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I'm still looking for a price closer to my limit. Would $95 be too far out of reach, or could we find common ground?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still aiming for a price closer to my budget. Would $100 be a feasible compromise?
